You Know You've Had Too Much Christmas Cheer When...

1. You notice your tie sticking out of your fly.
2. Someone uses your tongue for a coaster.
3. You start kissing the portraits on the wall.
4. You see your underwear hanging from the chandelier.
5. You have to hold on to the floor to keep from sliding off.
6. You strike a match and light your nose.
7. You take off your shoes and wade in the potato salad.
8. You hear someone say, "Call a priest!"
9. You hear a duck quacking and it's you.
10. You complain about the small bathroom after emerging from the closet.
11. You refill your glass from the fish bowl.
12. You tell everyone you have to go home... and the party's at your place.
13. You ask for another ice cube and put it in your pocket.
14. You yawn at the biggest bore in the room... and realize you're in front of the hall mirror.
15. You pick up a roll, and butter your watch.
16. You suggest everyone stand and sing the national budget.
17. You're at the dinner table and you ask the hostess to pass a bedpan.
18. You take out your handkerchief and blow your ear.
19. You tell your best joke to the rubber plant.
20. You realize you're the only one under the coffee table.

Unusual survey dat i foud!!

1. Wearing: Blue jeans & low cut top
2. Listening to: Maximes - anouther night
3. Thinking of: xmas

LAST THING YOU...

1. Bought: chip barm bout 5 mins ago
2. Ate and drank: chip barm n coffee
3. Watched on TV: 8 simple rules

EITHER / OR...

1. Achiever or slacker: archiever
2. Beer or cider: beer
3. Cats or dogs: dog
4. Your place or mine: mine
5. Pen or pencil: pen
6. Gloves or mittens: gloves
7. Food or candy: food
8. Cassette or CD: CDs
9. Coke or Pepsi: coke
10. Beach or water park: Beach

WHO DO YOU WANT TO...

1. Kill: no 1 at the mo
2. Hear from: the nhs wiv my big fat cheque
3. Look like: me im well fit lol
4. Be like: me
5. Avoid: my ex.. wanker

LAST PERSON YOU... AND WHEN?

1. Touched: my son Tyler - 5 mins ago
2. Talked to: me sis steph - talkin 2 her now
3. Hugged: my fiance - this mornin
4. Instant messaged: Dunno
5. ate with: Me sis steph, we had chip barms
6. Who broke your heart: my fiance wen we broke up 4 a couple of weeks - bout a year ago

WHERE DO YOU...

1. Eat: table
2. Dance: Kitchen - wen im reali drunk
3. Cry: anywhere - usually wen i cant stop laughing
4. Wish you were: On holiday

HAVE YOU EVER...

1. Dated one of your best friends? No
2. Loved somebody so much it makes you cry? Yeh
3. Drank alcohol? always
4. Done drugs: yeh
5. Broken the law: yeh
6. Ran away from home: yeh - me n me sis ran away wen we were bout 6 n hid in an alley
7. Broken a bone: yeh
8. Cheated on a test: yeh
9. Skinny-dipped: yeh
10. Played truth or dare: yeh
11. Flashed someone: yeh
12. Mooned someone: yeh
13. Kissed someone you didn't know: yeh
14. Been on a talk/game show: no
15. Been in a fight: yeh
16. Ridden in a fire truck: yeh
17. Been on a plane: yeh
18. Come close to dying: yeh
19. Cheated on a boy/girlfriend: yeh - big mistake - was pissed
20. Gave someone a piggy back/shoulder ride: all the time
21. Eaten a worm: no but me sis tried 2 feed me 1
22. Swam in the ocean: yeh

WHAT IS...

1. Your bedroom like? a dump- wiv out the rats (i tink)
2. Your favorite thing for breakfast? coffee n cig
3. Your favorite thing for lunch? bacon an chese panini.. and a hot chocolate
4. Your favorite thing for dinner? sausage, mash an beans
5. Your favorite Restaurant? choy hing village

ARE YOU...

1. Good At Sports?: hell yeh
2. Good At water-skiing?: never been
3. A Good Singer?: wen im not pissed
3. a good laugh? : the best
4. loud ?: propa loud
5. psychotic : a bit
6. A good Actor/Actress?: sometimes
8. A Good Dancer?: fuck no
9. shy: i dont tink so

wats ur name mean?

whats your name mean?
Body: Figure out what your name means!!!

A- You always want some action.
B- You are always cautious when it comes to meeting new people.
C- You definitely have a partier side in you.
D- You're Super cool.
E- You are popular with all types of people.
F- Fantasic chracteristics you brighten the room of everywhere you go.
G- You always want some action
H- You have very good personality and looks.
I- Love is something you deeply believe in.
J- Everyone loves you.
K- You like to try new things.
L- You are always smiling and making others smile.
M- Success comes easily to you.
N- You can be very "fun"...in bed
O- You love foreplay.
P- You are very friendly and understanding.
Q- You are a hypocrite.
R- You are social.
S- People think you are so sexy, especially your bf/gf
T- You have an attitude, a big one.
U- You usally r hella tight.
V- You are not judgemental.
W- You are very broad minded.
X- You never let people tell you what to do.
Y- You always make every experience Great.
Z- You have trouble trusting people.

Repost this with the title "Wats ur name mean???" in 3 minutes or something bad will happen to you at 1:00pm tomorrow MAKE EVERY EXPERIENCE GREAT

example.....

Fiona:
F- Fantasic chracteristics you brighten the room of everywhere you go.
I- Love is something you deeply believe in.
O- You love foreplay.
N- You can be very "fun"...in bed
A- You always want some action.

Stephanie
S- People think you are so sexy, especially your bf/gf

E- You are popular with all types of people.
P- You are very friendly and understanding.

How Sexy Are You?GET A PIECE OF PAPER AND NUMBER IT 1-11 (NO CHEATING)

SEE YOUR RESULTS BELOW:

WHEN YOU SEND IT ON PUT YOUR SCORE IN THE SUBJECT BAR.

1. WHAT SHADE OF HAIR DO YOU HAVE? a) Dark Light

2. OUT ON A DATE WOULD YOU WANT TO: a) Go to a party? Go out to eat?

3. WHAT IS YOUR FAVOURITE COLOUR OUT OF: a) Baby-Pink Yellow c) Baby-Blue d) Turquoise

4? PICK YOUR FAVOURITE HOBBY OUT OF: a) Surfing Skate-Boarding c) Skiing

5. IF YOU COULD PICK A STORE OUT OF THE FOLLOWING, WHICH WOULD IT
BE?
a) Louie Vuitton coach c) against all odds d) anything expensive

6. WHAT IS YOUR FAVOURITE PLACE OUT OF THE FOLLOWING? a) Hawaii
London c) Florida

7. IN THE SUMMER WOULD YOU RATHER GO TO: a) the Beach? Somewhere Cooler?

8. WHAT IS YOUR BIRTHDAY MONTH? a) January February c)March
d) April e) May f) June g) July h) August
i) September j) October k) November l) December

9. WOULD YOU RATHER: a) Chill at home Go out with friends

10. WHAT IS YOUR FAVOURITE INSTRUMENT OUT OF: a) Guitar Bass
guitar c) Drums d) The Triangle

11) NAME A PERSON OF THE OPPOSITE SEX ====NOW MAKE A WISH!===

ANSWERS**

1. a- dark= sexy [5points] b- light = sweet [2 points]

2. a- go to a party = playful show off[4 points] b. go out to eat =romantic[5 points]

3. a- baby-pink = cute [5] b- yellow = loud [3] c-baby-blue=
cool[5]d.turquoise = sexy [5]

4. a- surfing = the beach duh [7] b- skateboarding determined
rebel[4]c-skiing = daring [5]

5. a) Louie Vuitton=tasteful[7] coach=laid back[2] c) againt all odds=sytlish[5] d)anything expensive=expensive[9]

6. a) hawaii=you like being around people sunsets[5] London=You are quiet,and like the cold[2]c) florida= You like to party! [5]

7. a- beach = tan, likes the sun [5] b- somewhere cooler = pale and original[2]

8. a) January = popular [5] February lovely [2] c) March =
loud[2]d) April = playful[5] e)May = happy [5] f) June = chills a lot[8]
g)July = smooth [4] h) August = fun [5] i) September =quiet[10] j) October = out-going [2] k) November = pimpin' it [5] l)December = warm [3]

9. a- home = quiet, romantic [5] b- go out with friends = crazy [5]

10. a- guitar = eye-catching [5] b- bass-guitar = mellow[2]
c- Drums = loud [2] d) Triangle = crazy [5]

11. This person will fall in love with you!

SCORES!!!! UP TO 20 = Not so Sexy 21-35 = Rather sexy 45+ =
Too Sexy for this Test!!!!
its outa 56 by da way
IF YOU SEND THIS TO: 0-5 people: your wish will not come true

6-9 people: your wish will come true within months

10-15 people: it will come true within 2 weeks

16-20 people: in a day or 2 it will come true

21-30: sooooooo soon NOW
